description: Simple counter with increment/decrement/add/subtract operations, as well as optional clamping

hit_max.description: The last operation caused the counter to hit the maximum value

hit_min.description: The last operation caused the counter to hit the minimum value

left_max.description: The last operation caused the counter to leave the maximum value

left_min.description: The last operation caused the counter to leave the minimum value

counter_changed.description: Emitted whenever the counter processes an operation. The param contains the current value of the counter.

min.description: The lower bound of this counter

max.description: The upper bound of this counter

counter.description: The initial value this counter will have when it spawns

clampToMax.description: Whether to check and enforce the upper bound

clampToMin.description: Whether to check and enforce the lower bound
